snippet: The National Book Foundation announced the finalists for the 2014 National Book Awards in poetry, young adult literature, nonfiction and fiction on Wednesday morning.
abstract: The National Book Foundation announced the finalists for the 2014 National Book Awards in poetry, young adult literature, nonfiction and fiction on Wednesday morning.

headline.main: Shortlists for National Book Awards Announced
headline.print_headline: National Book Award Finalists Are Chosen
